article.title: SRI to Help Improve Ultra High Frequency Radar Detection
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: SRI International, Menlo Park, California, was awarded an $18 million contract for the support to improve the state-of-the-art ultra high frequency radar for detecting targets of interest.Â The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Engineer Research Development Center, Vicksburg, Mississippi, is the contracting activity.
